title: AI/Security-Focused Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
summary: Driven Master's student with a strong foundation in AI/ML, cybersecurity, and full-stack development, adept at architecting and implementing robust, precise solutions. Proven ability to deliver impactful projects, including an intelligent virtual interview simulator, a secure desktop-based file protection system featuring AES-256 encryption, and a feature-rich job portal. Proficient in Python, React, SQL, and AWS, with a keen interest in leveraging technology for secure and intelligent system design.

bullets: Created an automated interview preparation platform leveraging AI, facilitating realistic, role-specific job interview simulations via voice, video, or text responses.
Leveraged advanced NLP, Speech Analysis, and Computer Vision to evaluate over 7 key verbal and non-verbal cues (e.g., fluency, tone, facial expressions, confidence).
Engineered with React, Python (FastAPI/Flask), Whisper, GPT-4, and MediaPipe for scalable performance.
items.name: Intervue.AI

bullets: Built a local encryption solution offering robust AES-256 encryption, validating a 100% data protection rate in compliance with data security policies and audit requirements.

Developed a real-time Intrusion Detection System (IDS) to monitor file access patterns, effectively detecting and logging 98% of simulated malicious activities, serving as critical evidence for security assurance assessments.

Integrated a MySQL database to securely manage over 500 user credentials and file metadata, maintaining reliable data validation and consistency, and establishing comprehensive audit trails for system governance.
items.name: CypherStack

bullets: Architected and deployed an interactive job portal, implementing secure user authentication and role-based access control for multiple user types in adherence to IT policy and compliance standards.

Managed the MySQL database schema for over 200 active job postings and applications, implementing mechanisms to preserve data accuracy and detailed record-keeping for over 1,000 application records, critical for audit evidencing.
Spearheaded system design and functionality, emphasizing robust data handling and secure architecture, demonstrating a foundational understanding of IT governance and assurance principles.
items.name: Job Portal
Appreciation Prize
